message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $110?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really like the product. How about we meet at $95? I'm willing to pay that price
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to pay a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How about we meet at $105?
I'm getting a bit frustrated, but I still want the product. I'm willing to meet you at $98. That's as high as I'm willing to go

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
